html.p: Splunk 6.3 includes several usability enhancements to map controls, including:

ul.li: Configure whether you want the use scroll behavior to be interpreted as zoom in/out on a given map.
Disabling this will allow users to freely scroll through the dashboard without effecting any of the visualizations.
Option is available in the UI format options as "Zoom on Scroll".
Default is false (Note: this represents a change in the default behavior)
Center reset option is now available directly below the zoom controls.
Enables users to reset the center point as configured in the dashboard options.
